channel.title: CVE Feed for WS Form -- WS Form LITE – Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WS Form -- WS Form LITE – Drag & Drop Contact Form Builder for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-23987|2024-08-03T03:59:23.262Z -- ws%20form -- ws%20form%20lite%20%E2%80%93%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The WS Form LITE and Pro WordPress plugins before 1.8.176 do not sanitise and escape their Form Name, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.

item.title: CVE-2022-23988|2024-08-03T03:59:23.357Z -- ws%20form -- ws%20form%20lite%20%E2%80%93%20drag%20%26%20drop%20contact%20form%20builder%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The WS Form LITE and Pro WordPress plugins before 1.8.176 do not sanitise and escape submitted form data, allowing unauthenticated attacker to submit XSS payloads which will get executed when a privileged user will view the related submission
